transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Executive: Ji, very good morning sir.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Haan, sir, ye Vidyamitra ke liye request hai aapko.
Customer: To bataye ji isme.
Customer: No ma'am, by mistake, no concern.
Executive: Ah, sorry?
Customer: By mistake show ho gaya hoga, koi concern nahi hai.
Executive: By mistake ho gaya tha?
Customer: Haan haan, koi concern nahi.
Executive: Theek hai, to kya ye concern me close kar sakti hu aapka?
Customer: Yes yes.
Executive: Okay, theek hai. Sir, ek aur cheez aapse puchni thi.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Aapka hai na jo maine aapko bataya tha ki isme kuch product aise hai jo aapke deactivate hai. Please aap ek baar check kar lijiye, glass bottle waste karke hai.
Executive: Aur dusra aapka scrap glass ke naam se hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To abhi aap ek baar IndiaMART application open kariye.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ji, application open kar lijiye aap sir.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Aap ek baar product pe jaaiye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Neeche jaake likha rehta hai na, product pe click karna hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ab upar dekhenge sir, three dot aa raha hoga, right side ke corner me.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Three dot pe click kariye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Waha pe batayenge mujhe kaun kaun sa option aa raha hai aapke paas?
Customer: Active, rejected, deactive.
Executive: Deactive pe click kariye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab deactive me aap dekhenge, chaar product aa raha hai, glass bottle waste hai, 9700 per ton, dusra hai aapka glass powder funnel, 131 rupees, ye per piece me aa raha hai, I think wrong hai. Scrap glass hai aur lime powder hai. To mujhe bataye abhi ki kya glass bottle waste 9700 per ton hai. Is product me abhi aap deal kar rahe hai sir?
Customer: Nahi ye abhi available nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi kar rahe isme?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Is product ke naam pe click kariye sir.
Executive: Naam pe click kariye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur naam pe click karne ke baad na sir, upar phir se dekhenge, upar ke side matlab right corner me na phir se three dot aa raha hoga, us par click kariye.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aap dekhenge do option aa raha hoga, pehla hoga delete ka aur dusra hoga activate ka, hai na? Activate ke aage kya option hai, kaise option aa rahe hai batayenge aap?
Customer: View photo hai, change photo, activate.
Executive: Ah, nahi nahi, upar hai na three dot dobara aa raha hoga jab aapne product ke name pe click kiya hoga.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Teen dot aa raha hoga, teen dot pe click kariye dobara please.
Customer: Hmm hmm, delete product.
Executive: Delete ka aa raha hai? To agar aap is product me deal nahi kar rahe hai na sir, to aap please ise delete kar dijiye.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Haan, ise delete kar dijiye. Uske baad sir dusra product bhi, kyuki ye inactive wale jo product hote hai na sir, iski wajah se irrelevancy kaafi zyada aati hai. Aur irrelevancy aati hai jaha pe to phir waha problem hoti hai. Matlab hame proper buyer nahi mil paate. Aur irrelevancy isliye zyada generate hoti hai ki hum jis product line me agar deal kar rahe hai, correct? Aur agar yaha pe hamara product deactivate me hai, to buyer ko sir wo catalog visible nahi hoga us product line me. Aur agar hum deal nahi kar rahe hai, to hamare saath kahi na kahi se isse related leads aati rahengi. Right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan, to isse pehle na jo bhi aapke chaar product hai deactivate ki, please aap use delete kar dijiye sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ek baar apne according check kariye. Agar deal kar rahe hai, to activate kariye otherwise delete kariye.
Customer: Haan, wo ho gaya.
Executive: Ho gaya? Hmm.
Executive: Uske baad aap dusra dekhenge, dobara se product pe jayenge. Achha chaaro aapne kar diya.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai, ek baar aap buyleads wale option pe jayenge sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Buyleads wale page par jayenge.
Customer: Acha.
Executive: Ab yaha pe dekhenge, aapke paas abhi brown glass bottle scrap ki lead aayi hui hai. Brown glass scrap me deal karte hai aap?
Customer: Nahi ma'am, ye jo hai na, ye Hyderabad wale, ye barabar leads ka nahi dete.
Executive: Brown glass bottle scrap.
Customer: Hyderabad hamara hai ek.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Hmm, MK Enterprises.
Executive: Aap ek baar, ek baar apne product ke neeche thoda sa dekhenge na sir, aapki product cumulate glass scrap Jalgaon Maharashtra se aaya hai, paanch ton ki requirement check kariye aap. Scrap glass me cumulate glass scrap ki 30 se 55, 30,000 se 55,000 rupees ki order ready hai. Jalgaon Maharashtra se.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Dikha aapko waha pe?
Customer: Inse, inse kal baat hui thi hamara.
Executive: Inke contact by now pe pehle click karte hai na sir, ye lead ko aap consume kar lijiye. Agar ye aapka product line hai to. Kyuki abhi to hamare paas abhi kal Sunday tak hai. Kal aapko 10 lead allocate ho gayi hai aur daily ka hum bonus rakhte hai. To pehle aap isse consume kar lijiye.
Customer: Yes ma'am, thoda order value kaafi achha hai.
Customer: Haan, mai thodi time ke baad iska karta hu.
Executive: Nahi nahi, consume kar lijiye. Buyer ko call karke baad me baat kar lijiyega sir. Kyuki jo badi lead hamare paas aati hai na, wo aate barabar kya hai sir ki sold out ho jaati hai. To abhi ke liye morning ka time hai. Abhi sir kuch logo ne agar jaha kahi se chaar supplier agar select kar liye, to phir aap use consume nahi kar payenge. To isi ke liye mera kehna hai, just is lead ki unke by now pe click karke aap lead consume kar lijiye, theek hai? Phir baad me agar aapko time mila to aap follow up le lena, reminder aap use kar lena wo better hoga aapke liye.
Executive: Ek buyer to aisa bhi hai jisme aapka catalog bhi dekha hai, glass sheet waste me, Nagina Uttar Pradesh se hai. Inko glass sheet waste bhi chahiye as per customer requirement.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Mai dekhta hu isko.
Executive: Theek hai, aap isko dekh lijiye. Baaki sir further ye jo aapka Vidyamitra ka request tha na, mai ise close kar rahi hu. Aapke paas sir abhi mail par feedback aayega, theek hai?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Wo feedback sir jo aapki aur meri bhi baat hui hai, uske liye rahega. Agar aapko koi concern hai, aap please mujhe direct puch sakte hai. Otherwise koi concern nahi hai, to aap usme satisfied please mark kar dijiyega.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Theek hai? Agar koi concern hai to direct mujhe bata sakte hai sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai? To mai ise close kar rahi hu. Aapke paas mail aayega, feedback please aap share kar dijiyega, satisfied mark kar.
Executive: Theek hai? Okay.
Executive: Ji, okay sir.
Executive: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had a Vidyamitra request.

- Customer's products were deactivated.

- Customer receives irrelevant buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive closed Vidyamitra request.

- Executive guided to delete inactive products.

- Executive explained irrelevancy of inactive products.

- Executive advised to consume buyleads immediately.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a feedback form via email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- vidyamitra, deactivated products, buyleads, irrelevancy
